hero.name: Olena Mykhalska
about.title: About
about.p1: With more than 20 years of entrepreneurial experience, I have a deep understanding of the needs, constraints and daily challenges businesses face. I have learned to analyse operational problems, customer expectations, time pressure and the importance of having tools that are reliable and easy to use.
about.p2: Today, thanks to my engineering background and my skills in digital project management, UX/UI, SEO/SEA, web development and automation, I help entrepreneurs and organisations simplify their processes, optimise their tools and improve efficiency through digital solutions. I enjoy turning real business problems into clear, efficient and easy-to-use digital solutions.
comp.title: Skills & Projects
